synopsis.text:
Which path will Shigeo 'Mob' Kageyama choose as he navigates the trials of adolescence and the supernatural in the third season of Mob Psycho 100? As the powerful esper continues to grapple with expressing himself and maintaining a normal life, a new challenge arises in Seasoning City. A mysterious giant broccoli, known as the Divine Tree, sprouts and gains a devoted following from the Psycho Helmet Cult.

While attempting to dismantle this dangerous tree with the help of his mentor, Arataka Reigen, and others, Mob must also face the ordinary challenges of middle school. With the pressure of choosing a secondary school and filling out career forms looming, Mob struggles to find a balance between his human and esper life.

As he confronts emotional crises and reevaluates his naivety, Mob works on gaining independence and strengthening his connections with those around him. With new supernatural and everyday obstacles testing his stability, will Mob successfully overcome these challenges and continue on the path to maturity? Join Mob, Reigen, and the rest of the crew in the thrilling third season of Mob Psycho 100, brought to you by the renowned animation studio Bones and the creative mind of ONE.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
